<!-- Code generated from the comments of the WindowsOptions struct in builder/vsphere/clone/step_customize.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `run_once_command_list` (\*[]string) - CustomizationGuiRunOnce
  A list of commands to run at first user logon, after guest customization.

- `auto_logon` (\*bool) - CustomizationGuiUnattended
  Specifies whether or not the Windows guest operating system automatically logs on as Administrator.

- `auto_logon_count` (\*int32) - Specifies how many times the Windows guest operating system should auto-logon the Administrator account when auto_logon is true. Default 1

- `admin_password` (\*string) - The new administrator password for the Windows guest operating system.

- `time_zone` (\*int32) - The new time zone for the Windows guest operating system. This is a Windows Sysprep timezone code. Default 85 (GMT)

- `workgroup` (string) - CustomizationIdentification
  The workgroup for the Windows guest operating system.  Joining an Active Directory domain is not supported.

- `computer_name` (string) - CustomizationUserData
  The host name for the Windows guest operating system.

- `full_name` (string) - The full name of the user of the Windows guest operating system. Default: "Administrator"

- `organization_name` (string) - The organization name for which Windows guest operating system belongs. Default: "Built by Packer"

- `product_key` (string) - The product key for the Windows guest operating system.

<!-- End of code generated from the comments of the WindowsOptions struct in builder/vsphere/clone/step_customize.go; -->
